DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this registry is to produce a prospective, outcome-oriented registry to document the prevalence of AT/AF in the CRM population by using the Advanced AT/AF Diagnostics in select SJM devices.
DOC.brief_title: RATE Registry - Registry of Atrial Tachyarrhythmia/Atrial Fibrillation (AT/AF) Episodes in the Cardiac Rhythm Management (CRM) Device Population
DOC.criteria: Patient is implanted with a CRM device Patient has no documented history of AF (3 months prior to enrollment) Patient is >18 years of age Patient has life expectancy of >24 months
